title: Hexaware Technologies to Address Enterprise Financial Peopl
text:
DUBLIN, Ohio Hexaware Technologies , a leading global provider of IT, BPO and consulting services, today announced that it will lead a session titled, "Leveraging the Power of PeopleSoft 9.2's Payment Request Center with AWE," and exhibit at the upcoming PeopleSoft Ohio Regional Users Group event on September 24, 2015 at The Conference Center at OCLC in Dublin, Ohio . Financial executives are always looking for opportunities that can help them drive operational efficiencies. Hexaware will explore how PeopleSoft 9.2's Payment Request Center can help with the use of the Approval Workflow Engine.
TITLE:
Leveraging the Power of PeopleSoft 9.2's Payment Request Center with AWE.
WHEN :
Thursday, September 24, 2015 at 12:30 p.m. â€“ 1:30 p.m. EDT
WHERE :
The Conference Center at OCLC
WHO :
Satadru Roy, Senior Consultant & Head of Finance ERP Presales, Hexaware Technologies
WHAT :
This session will explore best practices, features and functionality available in the Payment Request Center and how organizations can take advantage of it.
Participants joining this session will gain the following:
An overview on the Payment Request offered through PeopleSoft 9.2, including its new autonomy features with easy, self-service guides for processing non-PO invoices that used to be time-consuming and costly. Extending the use of the Approval Workflow Engine (AWE), introduced in the PeopleSoft 9.1 release, to be infused with Payment Request as well as the workflow approval process within the organization, for optimizing finance-related operations. Hexaware is an Oracle Platinum Partner and one of the leading PeopleSoft service providers worldwide. Experts at Hexaware have enabled many organizations to realize ROI from PeopleSoft application investments, and helped then navigate diverse PeopleSoft services and environments, while ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
To schedule a meeting with Mr. Roy at the conference, or to learn more about Hexaware's diverse Oracle PeopleSoft solutions, contact events@hexaware.com .
About Hexaware Technologies
Hexaware is a leading global provider of IT & BPO services and consulting. The company focuses on key domains such as Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Travel, Transportation, Logistics, Life Sciences and Healthcare. Our business philosophy, "Your Success is Our Focus," is demonstrated through the success we ensure for our clients. Hexaware focuses on delivering business results and leveraging technology solutions by specializing in Business Intelligence & Analytics, Enterprise Applications, Quality Assurance and Testing, Remote Infrastructure Management Services and Legacy Modernization. Founded in 1990, Hexaware has a well-established global delivery model armed with proven proprietary tools and methodologies, skilled human capital and SEI CMMI-Level 5 certification. For additional information, log on to www.hexaware.com .
